name: U.S. EPA Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) - Clean Air Act

routes.documentation: Clean Air Act Download Data Service

responses.label: Results are a comma separated value (CSV) file or a file containing a GeoJSON feature collection.

responses.label: Results will either be an array of Facilities or an array of Clusters. The search will return clusters if the number of facilities returned is greater than the resposeset size, otherwise individual facility records will be returned.

routes.documentation: Clean Air Act Info Clusters Service

responses.label: Results are a comma separated value (CSV) file or a file containing a GeoJSON feature collection.

routes.documentation: Clean Air Act Info Clusters Service

responses.label: Results are a comma separated value (CSV) file or a file containing a GeoJSON feature collection.
Results are either an array of State, County, Zip Code facility cluster map coordinates or individual facility coordinates.  Coordinates provided are in WGS84.
Results are either an array of State, County, Zip Code facility cluster map coordinates or individual facility coordinates.  Coordinates provided are in WGS84.
